Award.AwardTitle: MRI: Acquisition of SMP Clusters for Supporting Shared-Memory Metacomputing Research

Directorate.LongName: Direct For Computer & Info Scie & Enginr

Division.LongName: Division Of Computer and Network Systems

Award.AbstractNarration:
EIA-0116759
Angkul Kongmunvattana
University of Nevada Reno

MRI: Acquisition of SMP Clusters for Supporting Shared-Memory Metacomputing

This is a proposal for equipment acquisition under the Major Research Instrumentation (MRI) program to support research and student training in the development of high-performance distributed computing systems. The goal is to develop efficient system software for supporting a seamless programming environment on symmetric multiprocessor (SMP) clusters.

Institution.Name: Board of Regents, NSHE, obo University of Nevada, Reno
